attributes.action: Make it compulsory for football teams to wear bands raising awareness for rasicm
attributes.additional_details: During the research we also completed a questionnaire to year sevens and eights about the issue. We asked the question: " Do you think that racism is the biggest issue in football?". 82% said yes and 18% said no. these results helped our research and backed up our point. Hopefully if you do make it compulsory to wear these say no to racism armbands will prevent more people from thinking its the biggest issue in football.
attributes.background: We are year nines that are studying inequality in sport for our coursework. From our research we found out that there is a lot of inequality in football that is ruining the game. These bands will help raise awareness for the issue.
